track.strDescriptionEN:
"Good Girls Go Bad" is a song recorded by American pop punk band Cobra Starship with guest vocals by Leighton Meester. It was the first single released from their third studio album, Hot Mess. The song was released digitally through iTunes on May 11, 2009. On May 8, 2009, "Good Girls Go Bad" made its radio debut on KIIS-FM with Ryan Seacrest's show.

The song was produced by former American Idol judge Kara DioGuardi and Kevin Rudolf. The song has enjoyed great success in the U.S., reaching number 7 on the US Billboard Hot 100, their first song to crack the Top 10, as well as their first song to chart on the Billboard Hot 100. The song received heavy airplay in Canada as well, debuting at 21 on Canada's radio airplay chart "Canadian Hit 30" week ending July 25, 2009. The song also debuted on Radio 1 in the UK in September 2009. As a reference to Leighton Meester's vocals, the track was used on Gossip Girl for several scenes where her character, Blair Waldorf, is portrayed on the episode "The Freshmen". This song was also used in Greek's "Friend or Foe?", in the season 4 premiere of Ugly Betty, and in the episode "Homecoming and Coming Home" of Hart of Dixie. The song was also featured briefly on the trailer for the 2010 comedy You Again.

Some of the official remixes also feature artist and singer Flo Rida.
